body_html:
The segfault itself is because:

RuntimeError: assertion failed: next_fn->num_inputs > 0 for next_fn: Embedding

i.e. next_fn->num_inputs is somehow == 0.
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/autograd/engine.cpp#L212

body:
The segfault itself is because:
```
RuntimeError: assertion failed: next_fn->num_inputs > 0 for next_fn: Embedding
```
i.e. next_fn->num_inputs is somehow == 0.
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/autograd/engine.cpp#L212
